events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I want to request a refund for this purchase.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's mention of refund and return.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah and I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund efficiently, may I also know if the jacket has been worn or altered in any way?
Sure, the order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, never worn, and still has the tags attached.
Thank you for the details. We can start the refund process right away. Please send the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick help! I will wait for the label and send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your bank account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund successfully. Please let us know if there's anything else we can assist you with.
Closing this case as resolved based on customer confirmation of refund receipt and no further queries.
